comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when change a data binding.

Build number: 
2.2.1.v200708027-0939

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report with a Chart named chart.
2. Drag a list from the Palette to the Layout and binding to report item chart.
3. Drag a Data from the Palette to the List Detail and select one from the 
   drop down list for Column Binding Name.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
